item.title: cold-morning-clear-lake
item.description: Camping at Clear Lake State Park and I have to admit it’s cold. My phone says the temp is 37Â°F and my little space heater appears to be broken. It gets warm but the fan doesn’t work so that’s all. Heading to the shower, then breakfast at TJs, then to Menards for a new space heater! -/-/-/ location: Clear Lake State Park
